item.title: Diderot
item.description: “The loom for making stockings is one of the most complicated and rigorously logical machines that we have… one could consider it as just one single piece of reasoning whose conclusion is the making of the stockings” - Denis Diderot, quited in Italo Calvino’s Collection of Sand.
